items.sentence: It was more difficult to do that than Tom said it would be.
It was obvious that the driver had not been careful enough.
It was raining hard, but she insisted on going for a drive.
Tom\'s reaction was the opposite of what Mary had expected.
Tom\'s wife would probably leave him if she knew the truth.
We can\'t let it get out that Tom is seeing a psychiatrist.
Tom and Mary don\'t get along. They have nothing in common.
Tom and Mary don\'t have much money so they seldom eat out.
Tom and Mary have both lost a lot of weight, haven\'t they?
Tom is slurring his words. I think he\'s drunk quite a lot.
Tom isn\'t the kind of man who would do that kind of thing.
Tom didn\'t want to eat and Mary couldn\'t persuade him to.
Tom doesn\'t know how much time it\'ll take him to do that.
I\'ve always wanted to be a professional basketball player.
I\'ve heard that Boston is a dangerous place. Is that true?
I\'ve learned a lot of French by watching movies in French.
If you want me to wear those boots, I\'ll wear those boots.
There are many countries in Europe that I\'d like to visit.
Tom couldn\'t think what he should give Mary for Christmas.
Tom decided that it wasn\'t necessary to paint the ceiling.
